result.title: Softwares and editors for macbook
result.content: I would like to know how the topcoders uisng mac setup up their coding environment, which editors do they use, and are there any softwares peresent for the best performance. I am facing some difficulties for eg. bits/stdc++ doesnt work with xcode, etc. I am aspiring to become a topcoder and any help would be really great. I would be great if they could also post how their editor looks like. Thanks a lot!!
